1 orange bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1 (10.5 ounce) container cherry or grape tomatoes, halved
1 (10 ounce) package frozen shelled edamame, prepared according to package directions
n: Rice and Veggie Salad with KnorrÂ® Sides
des: "This salad is fresh, colorful, healthy and DELICIOUS! Perfect for your next summer get-together."
ins:
Prepare rice according to package directions. Transfer to a large bowl and let cool.
Add bell peppers, cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, edamame, lime juice, olive oil, salt and pepper. Mix well and refrigerate until ready to serve!
